articles.author: Piet Levy
articles.title: Billy Joel postpones 8 concerts, including Milwaukee show, to recover from surgery - Milwaukee Journal Sentinel
articles.description: Joel's concert with Sting at American Family Field April 26 is being postponed while he recovers from surgery. A new date has yet to be announced.
articles.content:
• Billy Joel is postponing eight concerts in 2025 due to a recent surgery and the need for physical therapy.
  • The postponements include a show with Sting at American Family Field in Milw… [+2234 chars]
